[![Build Status](https://travis-ci.com/pcastellanoescuder/FOBIEnrichR.svg?branch=master)](https://travis-ci.com/pcastellanoescuder/FOBIEnrichR)

This package allows users to perform an enrichment analysis using FOBI (Food-Biomarker Ontology).

# Installation

```{r, eval = F}
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("pcastellanoescuder/fobienrich")
```
